image.name: baseLabelMapFileName
image.label: Base label map
image.description: All labels in the base image remain untouched except for the rules specified by the user applied \ to the information in the overlay label map.

image.name: overlayLabelMapFileName
image.label: Overlay label map
image.description: Contains labels that will be used together with the specified rules to update the base label map.

string-vector.name: overrideTypes
string-vector.label: Override chest types
string-vector.description: Any voxel in the base (input) image with this type will be set to UNDEFINEDTYPE first, and then \ the type specified will be set according to the locations of that type in the overlay image

string-vector.name: overrideRegions
string-vector.label: Override chest regions
string-vector.description: Any voxel in the base (input) image with this region will be set to UNDEFINEDREGION first, and then \ the region specified will be set according to the locations of that region in the overlay image

string-vector.name: overrideRegionTypePairs
string-vector.label: Override chest region, chest type pairs
string-vector.description: Any voxel in the base (input) image with this region-type pair combination will have \ the type set to UNDEFINEDTYPE. The region will be untouched. All voxels in the overlay image having \ the specifed pair will have their type grafted onto the base image. The list of comma separated string \ values passed with this flag will be interpreted as a list of pairs, where the first member of the pair \ will be interpreted as the region value, and the second element of the pair will be considered as the type.

string-vector.name: mergeTypes
string-vector.label: Merge chest types
string-vector.description: The type specified will be set according to the locations of that type in the overlay image

string-vector.name: mergeRegions
string-vector.label: Merge chest regions
string-vector.description: The region specified will be set according to the locations of that region in the overlay image

string-vector.name: mergeRegionTypePairs
string-vector.label: Merge chest region, chest type pairs
string-vector.description: All voxels having the specified region-type in the overlay image will be merged with the base image -- only the type will be \ grafted onto the base image, however. The specified region serves to identify the voxels in the overlay image, but the value of the \ region itself is not grafted
